div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 264 Corinth, 1948 Burial: c. 146 B.C. Contents: 34 AE. From excavations Cleopatra I: 1 (as Svoronos 1380) Ptolemy V or VI: 31 (as Sv. 1384) Ptolemy VI-VIII: 2 (as Sv. 1424-5) Disposition: Old Corinth Thompson, Hesperia 1951, pp. 355-67, illus.
